entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
